question.body: Rudolfo anticipates a very busy semester, so he completes the entire statistics course in the first month of the semester, passing each Checkpoint easily. While this frees up his time for other courses, he finds that when he goes to take the final exam a few months later, he has forgotten a lot of what he learned. Rudolfo failed to

multiple_choice.choice: accurately evaluate his own strengths and weaknesses.
plan an effective strategy for working through the course.
